author: Anthony Hay For Mailonline
title: Real Madrid vs Espanyol La Liga LIVE: Bale to make return | Daily Mail Online
text:
Real Madrid XI: Casilla, Carvajal, Pepe, Varane, Nacho, Ronaldo, Kroos, Kovacic, Lucas Vazquez, Morata, Isco 
Subs: Yanez, James, Bale, Marcelo, Casemiro, Mariano, Asensio 14:28 Real Madrid 3-1 Napoli 
Unlike Barcelona, Real Madrid have one foot in the Champions League quarter-finals after their impressive 3-1 over Napoli. 
Benzema, Kroos and Casemiro scored the goals for Zidane's men at the Santiago Bernabeu on what was a comfortable evening for the La Liga giants. 14:19 Real Madrid sitting pretty at the top 
Real Madrid are in a strong position in the La Liga table as they are a point ahead of rivals Barcelona with two games in hand due to their participation in the FIFA Club World Cup. 
Atletico Madrid defeated Sporting Gijon 4-1 earlier today but Diego Simeone's side are still four points behind their neighbours. 
Barcelona, who face Leganes tomorrow, will be down in the dumps this weekend following their embarrassing 4-0 defeat at the hands of Paris Saint-Germain. 14:15
